nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements

Interface BrokeringServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrokeringService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrokeringServiceImpl

    public interface BrokeringServiceLocal
extends BrokeringService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
